io.ddf.content

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.ddf.content.Schema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Schema
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Table schema of a DDF including table name and column metadata
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This class represents the metadata of a column

        @Deprecated
public Schema(String columns)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor that can take a list of columns in the following format: " , ". For example, "id string, description string, units integer, unit_price float, total float" . This string will be parsed into a List of Schema.Columns.
        Parameters:
        columns -
